name: Switchback (A 3-in-1 Remake)
description: The first map I made for ZPack, which ended up as E2M1, introducing the episode of multi-themed and unusual maps. It was born a reversed remake of the first three maps of my first released project, Scourge. There's a big element of exploring the features of ZDoom here, but the overall result is a free-flowing adventure that doesn't take too long to clear.
